customer_addr:

Rahway, NJ 07065

citations.narrative:
12 adult beagle dogs did not have water available to them. The dogs are usually housed in enclosures with automatic
"lixit" type waterers, but at the time of inspection they were being temporarily housed in other enclosures while their usual
enclosures were being santizied. The dogs had been in the temporary enclosures for 30 minutes. There were no water
bowls n the enclosures and those with lixits were not connected to a water source. The dogs were immediate given water
in bowls and some did not drink while others drank normally. Potable water, essential for the health and wellbeing of
dogs, must be continuously available.
Correction date: October 9, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian.
n

narrative:
3.10(a) 
   
Watering 
12 adult beagle dogs did not have water available to them. The dogs are usually housed in enclosures with automatic 
"lixit" type waterers, but at the time of inspection they were being temporarily housed in other enclosures while their usual 
enclosures were being santizied. The dogs had been in the temporary enclosures for 30 minutes. There were no water 
bowls n the enclosures and those with lixits were not connected to a water source. The dogs were immediate given water 
in bowls and some did not drink while others drank normally. Potable water, essential for the health and wellbeing of 
dogs, must be continuously available. 
Correction date: October 9, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian. 
 
 n
